text: Okay. That's what's there. Well... There's a cookie jar there, with the lid off, and the kid was up getting cookies. And he's upset. There's a water spigot here. Okay, hang on a second. Let me have you look at this again, and I want you to tell me everything you see going on right here. What do you see going on there? That kid's getting cookies. See, you got a handful of them. Can you see anything else? What else is going on? This is the cupboard up here. Here somebody ate and left their dish set. This one's dry in the dishes. What else do you see going on here? This lady's drying dishes. Do you see anything else going on? That's a cookie jar and a little boy's on a ladder trying to get cookies. Okay, let me take that away.
